panel.field: This makes the 290 timer count down to zero, and will
run event #0005 when it reaches zero (Add it in Head.TSC!)
You can set the timer with OOB flags (Starting with Flag C104)
It's tics that are then converted into seconds,
so you will have to do some math...
or set a random flag between C113 and C120 ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
[ You probably also want to add EQ-0256 to event 5 ]
